full_summary:
### Request for Proposal
**Valcartier Health Center Janitorial Services**

**Tender Reference:** WS4410602258
**Publication Date:** January 24, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 4, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for janitorial services at the Valcartier Health Center. The successful contractor will be responsible for supplying the required labour, equipment, and products, as specified in the technical specifications.

**Scope of Work:**
The RFP includes, but is not limited to, the following services:

* Maintaining the cleanliness and health standards of the facility
* Supplying all necessary equipment and materials
* Ensuring compliance with federal regulations and PSPC policies

**Proposal Evaluation Criteria:**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Lowest price

**Tender Attachments:**
The full RFP document, including technical specifications and terms and conditions, can be accessed through the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18608321?extsite=MTg2MDgzMjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18608321?extsite=MTg2MDgzMjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Important Contacts:**
For any questions or clarifications, please contact:

Fahad Zanoun, Public Works and Government Services Canada
[Email: fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
